title: Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch III - Oudou
synopsis: Lelouch Lamperouge's dreams of destroying the Holy Britannian Empire are slowly crumbling. His sister, Nunnally, has been kidnapped by Schneizel el Britannia, and Suzaku Kururugi is ignoring his desperate pleas for assistance. The Black Knights are slowly losing faith in Lelouch as their leader, and the United Federation of Nations has declared global war on Britannia.
related_anime: ['Code Geass: Fukkatsu no Lelouch', 'Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch R2', 'Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch II - Handou']
